review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so very much for your words of appreciation. Feel humbled.🙏

survey_response.review_text:
1) Painless RCT that too in a single sitting.
2) Total procedure completed in 3 sittings.
3) Ambiance of the clinic is extremely good.
4) Half the problem solved while talking to Dr. Bhattacharya.
5) His expertise is this field is tremendously good, a few words are not sufficient to express this. If required, one will have to visit his clinic and experience all these mentioned above.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much maam for your encouraging words….. this helps us and motivates us to even do better.

survey_response.review_text: I walked in with fear and I was a bundle of nerves. The tools kept in the  chamber for RCT are indeed scary and I could gauge what lay in store for me. But I am so happy to share all the pain that I thought I would experience in the process of RCT remained in my imagination. In effect, I had almost a painless RCT process stretched over five sessions. A big thank you to Dr Anirban Bhattacharya for this painless experience. I also need to mention the politeness of the support staff that makes the ambience of Dentistry so patient friendly.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. This is going to motivate us to do even better.

survey_response.review_text: \"I recently had a treatment on my front  4 upper teeth with the doctor  and I couldn't be more pleased with the results. Prior to the treatment, my teeth were in very bad condition, causing me both physical discomfort and self-consciousness about my smile. From the initial consultation, I was impressed with the dentist's thorough explanation of the procedure, the options available, and what I could expect during the recovery process.The level of care and attention to detail during the treatment was exceptional. The dentist and their team were not only highly professional but also very supportive and reassuring throughout the entire process.I am absolutely thrilled with the outcome. My teeth have been transformed, and I now have the confidence to smile without hesitation. The difference is night and day, and I am so grateful for the expertise and kindness shown by Dr. Anirban Ji and their team.I highly recommend him to anyone considering dental treatment. Their skill, professionalism, and the outstanding results speak for themselves.\

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much Mr. Ray. It was indeed a pleasure dealing with you and treating your wife and son. I am glad that we met your expectations and your words of appreciation will motivate us to serve even better.

survey_response.review_text:
My wife and my son recently had the pleasure of receiving dental treatment from Dr. Anirban Bhattacharyya, and I cannot express how delighted I am with the exceptional care they received during the Root Canal Treatment (RCT) and Re-Root Canal Treatment (ReRCT) procedures. From the moment we walked into the clinic, we felt welcomed and at ease, which is not something you typically associate with a dental visit.

Dr. Anirban demonstrated a high level of professionalism and took the time to thoroughly explain the procedures, the reasons for the ReRCT, and the expected outcomes, ensuring we were well-informed and comfortable throughout the entire process, instantly putting us at ease.

What truly sets apart is his meticulous attention to detail and commitment to patient comfort. During both the RCT and ReRCT, both my wife and son experienced minimal discomfort and absolutely no pain. He answered all of our questions with patience, and we never felt rushed during any of our appointments.

Additionally, the clinic's facilities and warm atmosphere contributed to an overall positive experience. The staff at his clinic were friendly, efficient, and accommodating, making scheduling appointments and follow-up visits a breeze.

I am pleased to report that the outcome of both my wife's and son's RCT/ReRCT exceeded our expectations. The dental crown was expertly fitted, with perfect color matching and the pain they were experiencing before the procedure has completely disappeared, and we are incredibly grateful to him for their expertise and dedication to oral health.

Thank you, Dr. Anirban, for your exceptional work and for making our dental visits comfortable and pain-free, especially within such a short time-frame as we had to return overseas. I will definitely be returning for all of our future dental needs!

Warm regards, 
Dilip Ray

*** ****** ** ******* ************ ** * *** ***** ******* *** appears sympathetic in Apollo Gleneagles as a consultant whereas in his own clinic, he is one of the rudest persona who won't listen to the patient's issues/problems.The issue is related to my wife who had earlier went for consultation in Apollo to the concerned doctor where he diagnosed the issue doesn't needs RCT and can be corrected by regular filling. However, after filling, the problem didn't solved and we were forced to visit him in his own clinic due to uncertainity of his presence in the corona 2nd wave lockdown. At the time of visit, he directly said it needs RCT and that too on two teeth.After that, we told we will go for RCT for 1 tooth only which was causing much pain and will go for RCT on the 2nd one after the first one is completed and stabilized. Upon hearing this, the doctor was not amused and insisted for RCT on both despite both being on two different sides of the mouth. However, we told we will go for RCT in one side only and the same was carried out. Later, for crown placement, he insisted for PFM filling whereas we proposed for Zirconia (as she is allergic to almost all metals due to which she cannot keep jewellery for longer period of time). Upon this, the dentist was miffed and he insisted for PFM for which we clarified why we cannot take the PFM crown. He was constantly deriding us and later after a nearby deep filling during which gum was cut & bleeding, he insisted for mould fitting despite the gum was bleeding/hurt. He even flipped out against the patient as she was unable to provide enough pressure as she was hurt. Later, the filling was turning out to be painful and when we requested for sometime to heal for crown fitting, he was adamant that we should visit and will try to sort out the pain. However, during visit, he didn't cared much about pain and completed his crown fitting ** **** ** ***** ** **** *** ****** ********* ** **** ******** We told we will pay advance for crown but didn't want the same to placed that time but it fell on deaf ears.Now 1 month later, the pain didn't stopped and bad smell/some bluish stuff was seen in the operated area from naked eye. The same was conveyed to the dentist and he gave us appointment few days ago. However, during visit, he was rude/inconsiderate towards the issue told by the patient and was just trying to get rid of us despite our request for thorough investigation/measures to reduce the pain. He didn't prescribed any painkiller/medicine and now my wife is still facing the pain and traumatized by her experience.I will request the concerned people not to visit the doctor atleast in this clinic *** ** *** ****** ***** *** ********* ** ********** *** *** ** ****** ******* * **** ** ******************** ***** ******** ******* **** ****** ** **** *** ********** **** ** ****** **** **** ******** ***** *** **** ******** *********

I went to Dr. Bhattacharyya in December 2014 for a root canal for tooth number 14. Two years later, December 2016, I am having that tooth extracted by another doctor. So what happened in between? Six months after that root canal, the crown came off. I do not live in the same city, so the next time I visited Kolkata, I went to him to get the crown fixed. He told me that the batch of glue he used was bad, which made sense because another family member who had visited him also had their crown come off. Dr. Bhattacharyya got me a new crown in 2015. 

One year later, while chewing food, the crown came off again. This time, I texted him about what to do. He asked me to take the crown to a local dentist and get it fixed. So I did that. Only that my new dentist was shocked to see the condition of my tooth. The root canal was not done properly, and the infection had spread to the adjoining areas in these two years, causing the gums to inflame and the crown to pop out. It wasn't a bad batch of glue, it was my gum infection that made the crown come off. The damage was irreparable and the tooth needs to be extracted now. This isn't a wisdom tooth tucked in a corner of my mouth. **** ***** ******** ** ** *** *** * **** *** ************* *** *** ** * ****** *** ** * **** ****** ******* ** **** ********** ***** *** *** ***** ** ** ******* ***********

I would not recommend Dr. Bhattacharyya to anyone, nor would I ever visit him again. I will not take the loss of a tooth lightly, since this was completely preventable. A very disappointing and painful experience.

review_reply.reply_text: I wish you had mentioned your name, nevertheless thank you so much for your kind words.

survey_response.review_text: He is a very good and experienced doctor, very friendly and polite. I am very satisfied with my R.C.T.

review_reply.reply_text:
This is so amazing to know from a
patient who has been with me  for almost a decade. Thank you Sir for placing your faith once more on us and glad to know that you are not disappointed!!

survey_response.review_text: The first time I had met Dr. Bhattacharyya was in 2014 at his Dum Dum clinic, had 2 RCTs done and you have to trust me when I say this, that i had almost forgotten that they were treated and no more in their original form, this should tell us about his fine  practised pair of hands. Then in between had gone to a couple of places only to come back in 2023 to his new South Kolkata clinic for a Re- RCT for a botched up work elsewhere. I am very hopeful and confident that I will be writing few more lines after few years on the recent work that has happened. Thank you Doctor for all your support and consideration.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much Sir for your kind words.... it inspires us to do better.

survey_response.review_text:
Do you remember every man that you come across in life ?
Well, Dr. Bhattacharya is not one of them that would go into oblivion easily.
** ** * *** ** ***** ******** ********** ************* ****** ********** **** **** ***** ** ** ****** *** more importantly confident about what he is doing all rolled into one. (You can always visit the Apollo Dental’s website for a snapshot of his professional achievements)
You will be surely moved by his deep integrity towards his profession and his keen interest to solve your issue, I mean to cure you, if you meet him. 
When we met for the first time, the first thing that I noticed was his exemplary confidence radiating from every word coming out of his mouth. It went a long way to alleviate my fear.
And all that was proved when he very masterly solved my 4 years old tooth problem with all the diligence and care that exceeded my expectations compelling me to pen a few words about my experience with this extraordinary man.
And, did I forget to mention that he would also be remembered as a man of very social demeanour.  
I would like to end this note with my heartfelt thanks to Dr. Bhattacharya. May the almighty be with him, always.

Debanjan Ghosh
ACMA (India), CMA(USA), MBA (Finance)

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much maam for your kind words. This motivates us to do our job with confidence .

survey_response.review_text:
I went to the clinic with lot of apprehensions and fear, as everyone told me that Root Canal is going to be extremely painful.  However I was explained the process and the Dos and Don’t s were also mentioned. The entire process was carried out very smoothly and Dr. Bhattacharyya has the Midas Touch. I felt no pain at all. 
Thank you to the entire team, keep up the good work.
Regards ,
Nivedita Roy

survey_response.review_text: Knows his job pretty well, very professional but polite. The condition of my tooth was very critical. Every doctor suggested root canal but it was very challenging keeping in mind the position of my tooth. He carried out the operation very smoothly and I did not feel any pain during or after the process. Would definitely recommend him for severe critical treatments.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you for your appreciation. Motivates us to serve you better!!

survey_response.review_text:
I had booked an appointment in advance which led to minimum waiting time, which was a new experience for me.

The procedure felt like a breeze with Dr. Bhattacharya continuosly interacting with me to keep me distracted. There was little to no pain.

Highly recommended.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank You so much for your kind words. I am glad that I could sort out your mother’s issues.

survey_response.review_text:
Last month, I took my mother to Dr Bhattacharya who was suffering from severe toothache since last 15 days. Doctor instantly x-rayed the affected tooth and recommended for extraction of one tooth and RCT for the other. Both surgeries were done within 10 days and my mother got relieved from the problem completely. My mother was completely impressed by doctor's friendliness, understanding of the problem and ability to give quick relief. The surgery was very smooth and painless.
Thank you , Dr Bhattacharya

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words!! Helps us in a big way to serve our patients even better.

survey_response.review_text:
It was an wonderful experience with the treatment process with the doctor. He have really amazing hands and experience. 
 Most importantly he is a true professional. 
This I should mention explicite as I had to complete the process in a time bound manner and on last day there was a small glitch on the crown. He managed his time to plan an additional visit to clinic and finish the process, as I had to travel out before any of his future schedule. 

 Also we had amazing conversation on different topics which actually always helpful to get confidence and release stress of RCT treatment.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much for your feedback!! It helps us so much to  boost our morale and to strive for better!!

survey_response.review_text:
Dr. Anirban has been a saviour for me. I have been facing dental issues since last 2 years and resorted to temporary fixes, as suggested by few others.
However, in my first appointment with Dr. Anirban, I was clearly explained what exactly js the issue, possible problems in future and permanent solution - root canal treatment.
I did not even realised how quickly RCT happened over couple of weekends. I had extreme clarity on what is happening, how it is happening and by when it will be over.
I was given complete information on various charges and also suggestions on what would be better. There was no push to go for a treatment, which might cost more.
Really appreciate your gesture *** ****** ********* ********** Thank you Doctor!

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much Sir for the kind words!! It was indeed a pleasure working on your mother. She was an absolute delight .

survey_response.review_text:
Dr. Anirban B is AWESOME.

I took my 79 year old mother to visit the dr. for tooth extraction and removal of partial tooth by surgery. Due to her age we planned on visiting few dentists to ensure she is very comfortable.  On top of that I am visiting from abroad only for a couple of weeks. In our first appt. we were impressed by the doctor's friendliness, understanding of the matter, knowledge and ability to give quick appts. My mother felt comfortable to proceed with Dr. Anirban. The surgeries went very smooth and painless, should have visited him before only. 

Thank you Dr. Anirban B.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you ma’am for you having faith in us and we are so glad that we could meet your expectations. Nothing is more important to us than to see our patients satisfied . Your words of appreciation will go a long way to motivate us!!

survey_response.review_text: ********** ************ ** *** **** ******* *** one of the most compassionate doctors I have ever come across.... with his expertise he has treated my crumbled,rotten and jagged teeth very patiently and had just not given up on them even at times when it was next to impossible....he has given me a beautiful smile...I owe my smile to him...I highly recommend him for any dental issues...his excellence cannot be put into words.... Dr.Anirban Bhattacharyya is an outstanding and a perfect doctor....everytime when I smile I shall remember you sir. My heartfelt gratitude to you..

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation!!! It was a pleasure for us to have you and your family as patients.You guys are awesome.

survey_response.review_text: I had one RE-RCT and 2 RCTs within a very tight schedule of 2 weeks in kolkata as I live abroad. I had 3 Zirconia crowns fitted as well. Because of my tight schedule in India, I was only available on specific days for these procedures to be done and Dr Bhattacharyya very kindly managed to fit me in for these  treatments. He did an excellent job and was very thorough in his approach. I am extremely satisfied with the outcome and overall experience and I can say the same on behalf of my wife and my father who had extensive treatments done by him within the last one year.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you Mr. Choudhury for your kind appreciation. These words help us to strive harder to serve you better.

survey_response.review_text: I live in Kenya and had a huge issue with the tooth - specifically due to the fact that it was inside and causing sporadic pain. Extremely hesitant to visit a non Indian doctor coupled with the fact that I was coming down anyway to Kolkata for a vacation, I got in touch with Dr. Bhattacharya. An amazing human who would put you in sheer comfort the moment you meet him - a glamorous smile and his huge experience as a dentist possibly gives him the confidence of making his patient feel so much at ease. He did my complex case so well - did not even feel a bit of pain. I will be indebted to him forever and will make it a point to visit him every time to ensure my own well being. Thank you Dr. Bhattacharya for the amazing doctor and human that you are. Difficult to find nowadays. I wish you all the best *** ** **** **** *** *** *** ** *** ****** ****** ******** ** *** ********

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much Saumya!!

survey_response.review_text:
I flew down from Singapore to Kolkata to get myself treated by Dr Bhattacharyya, upon another trusted doctor's recommendation. 

It was an absolute pleasure to receive the treatment from the good doctor. As I had been misdiagnosed previously, it made me very comfortable that the doctor took utmost care to analyse the problem and explain the various treatment options before proceeding to execute it carefully. He was very reassuring and transparent with what I should expect throughout and I experienced no pain or discomfort at any point. 
During the entire procedure spanning 10 days, he was available at all times to answer any queries and offered to treat me even on his days off if a problem arose. He was also mindful to follow up on my condition over the next few weeks and months. 

I am very pleased with both the execution and results of my treatment and I highly recommend Dr Bhattacharyya!

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you Ms. Bhatta for your encouraging words. We are glad we could help you with your trouble. Your good wishes will help us to do more such jobs.

survey_response.review_text: Will definitely recommend to everyone for any kind of dental problem. I have been suffering quite long due to my broken crown (RCT done by another doctor previously) and painful teeth. My problem has been well attended and successfully resolved by Dr. Anirban, and the lady who was in the reception was also very friendly. I had visited several other doctors before but did not get any solution. I was then referred by one of my family friend who advised me for the consultation. I am really happy that I did and want to thank my doctor for taking me out of this pain.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words Sir and for your trust on us.🙏

survey_response.review_text: My wifes tooth RCT was done very nicely. She got relief from her tooth pain completely in 2  -3 days. Their clnic is well equiped and treatment is done very friendly manner. If u have any dental problem you must visit him and get relief from your dental problems.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much Sir. We always believe there is no substitute to your natural dentition. And I always try to reason it out with the patient the exact situation at hand and what is the realistic expected outcome. Thanks to you that you saw my reasoning and gave the tooth a chance and it worked out. Happy you and an even happier me. Thank you for your belief in us.

survey_response.review_text: I consulted him with a very complicated case. I have an impacted wisdom tooth grown horizontally. It partially damaged the second molar. There was significant bone loss and infection in root apex. I was going through tooth pain for couple of months. I consulted couple of other dentist as well. Every one told me I have to extract both wisdom tooth and second molar. Dr Bhattacharya told me though there is bone loss, still he can try to keep the molar tooth. He explained me all the possibilities clearly. Now RCT is completed, pain is gone. He really did a very good job. He is a perfectionist.  The best part is he always tries to keep the original tooth. I would recommend everyone to consult him.

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind review. It was such a privilege and proud moment for me  to have you as my patient!!! I am glad I could live upto your expectation.
